mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(hct.assign_nid) AS total FROM ht_credit_tender hct

select SUM(hct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(hct.assign_account) AS sumAssignAccount, SUM(hct.assign_interest) AS sumAssignInterest, SUM(hct.assign_price) AS sumAssignPrice, SUM(hct.assign_pay) AS sumAssignPay, SUM(hct.assign_repay_account) AS sumAssignRepayAccount, SUM((select sum(manage_fee) from ht_credit_repay where assign_nid= hct.assign_nid)) AS sumCreditFee FROM ht_credit_tender hct

SELECT hbi.borrow_nid as borrowNid, hbi.name as borrowName, hb.borrow_style as borrowStyle, cr.recover_period as recoverPeriod, cr.assign_capital as assignCapital, cr.assign_interest as assignInterest, cr.assign_account as assignAccount, cr.manage_fee as manageFee, cr.status, CASE WHEN cr.assign_repay_next_time > 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( cr.assign_repay_next_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ELSE '' END as assignRepayNextTime FROM ht_credit_repay cr LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi on hbi.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb on hb.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid WHERE assign_nid = #{assignNid}
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select SUM(cr.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(cr.assign_interest) AS sumAssignInterest, SUM(cr.assign_account) AS sumAssignAccount, SUM(cr.manage_fee) AS sumManageFee from ht_credit_repay cr LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi on hbi.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb on hb.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid WHERE assign_nid = #{assignNid}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid

SELECT ct.assign_nid AS assignNid, bc.client AS client, ct.credit_nid AS creditNid, ct.bid_nid AS bidNid, ct.credit_user_name AS creditUserName, CASE WHEN credit_users.attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN credit_users.attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN credit_users.attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN credit_users.attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END recommendAttrCreditSelf, `od3_credit`.`name` AS `regionNameCreditSelf`, `od2_credit`.`name` AS `branchNameCreditSelf`, `od_credit`.`name` AS `departmentNameCreditSelf`,
ct.user_name AS userName, CASE WHEN pna_u.attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN pna_u.attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN pna_u.attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN pna_u.attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END recommendAttrSelf, `od3_u`.`name` AS `regionNameSelf`, `od2_u`.`name` AS `branchNameSelf`, `od_u`.`name` AS `departmentNameSelf`, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assignCapital, FORMAT(bc.credit_discount, 2) AS creditDiscount, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assignCapitalPrice, FORMAT(ct.assign_price, 2) AS assignPrice, FORMAT(ct.assign_interest_advance, 2) AS assignInterestAdvance, FORMAT(ct.credit_fee, 2) AS creditFee, FORMAT(ct.assign_pay, 2) AS assignPay, DATE_FORMAT(ct.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS addTime, u_re.username AS recommendName, CASE WHEN u_re.attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN u_re.attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN u_re.attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN u_re.attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END recommendAttr, `od3_re`.`name` AS `regionName`, `od2_re`.`name` AS `branchName`, `od_re`.`name` AS `departmentName`,
u_credit_re.username AS recommendNameCredit, CASE WHEN u_credit_re.attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN u_credit_re.attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN u_credit_re.attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN u_credit_re.attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END recommendAttrCredit, `od3_credit_re`.`name` AS `regionNameCredit`, `od2_credit_re`.`name` AS `branchNameCredit`, `od_credit_re`.`name` AS `departmentNameCredit`,
ct.invite_user_name AS inviteUserName, CASE WHEN ct.invite_user_attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN ct.invite_user_attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN ct.invite_user_attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN ct.invite_user_attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END inviteUserAttribute, ct.invite_user_regionname AS inviteUserRegionname, ct.invite_user_branchname AS inviteUserBranchname, ct.invite_user_departmentname AS inviteUserDepartmentname,
ct.invite_user_credit_name AS inviteUserCreditName, CASE WHEN ct.invite_user_credit_attribute = 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN ct.invite_user_credit_attribute = 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN ct.invite_user_credit_attribute = 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN ct.invite_user_credit_attribute = 3 THEN '线上员工'ELSE '' END inviteUserCreditAttribute, ct.invite_user_credit_regionname AS inviteUserCreditRegionname, ct.invite_user_credit_branchname AS inviteUserCreditBranchname, ct.invite_user_credit_departmentname AS inviteUserCreditDepartmentname,
hta.status AS contractStatus, hta.contract_number AS contractNumber, ct.user_id as userId, ct.credit_tender_nid as creditTenderNid, hta.download_url AS downloadUrl, hta.viewpdf_url AS viewUrl, hta.img_url AS imgUrl
FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user pna_u ON pna_u.user_id = ct.user_id -- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hui ON u.user_id = hui.user_id -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_u ON cast(hui.attribute AS CHAR) = pna_u.name_cd AND pna_u.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY' LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_users` `ou_u` ON `ou_u`.hyd_id = pna_u.user_id AND ou_u.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od_u` ON `od_u`.`id` = `ou_u`.`departmentid` AND `od_u`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od2_u` ON `od2_u`.`id` = `od_u`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od3_u` ON `od3_u`.`id` = `od2_u`.`parentid`
-- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_spreads_users hydsu ON u.user_id = hydsu.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u_re ON u_re.user_id = pna_u.spreads_user_id -- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hui_re ON hui_re.user_id = hydsu.spreads_userid -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_re ON cast(hui_re.attribute AS CHAR) = pna_re.name_cd AND pna_re.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY' LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_users` `ou_re` ON `ou_re`.hyd_id = u_re.user_id AND ou_re.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od_re` ON `od_re`.`id` = `ou_re`.`departmentid` AND `od_re`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od2_re` ON `od2_re`.`id` = `od_re`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od3_re` ON `od3_re`.`id` = `od2_re`.`parentid`
LEFT JOIN ht_r_user credit_users ON credit_users.user_id = ct.credit_user_id -- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hui_credit ON hui_credit.user_id = credit_users.user_id -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_credit ON cast(hui_credit.attribute AS CHAR) = pna_credit.name_cd AND pna_credit.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY' LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_users` `ou_credit` ON `ou_credit`.hyd_id = pna_u.user_id AND ou_credit.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od_credit` ON `od_credit`.`id` = `ou_credit`.`departmentid` AND `od_credit`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od2_credit` ON `od2_credit`.`id` = `od_credit`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od3_credit` ON `od3_credit`.`id` = `od2_credit`.`parentid`
-- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_spreads_users hydsu_credit ON credit_users.user_id = hydsu_credit.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u_credit_re ON u_credit_re.user_id = credit_users.spreads_user_id -- LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info ui_credit_re ON ui_credit_re.user_id = hydsu_credit.spreads_userid -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_credit_re ON cast(ui_credit_re.attribute AS CHAR) = pna_credit_re.name_cd AND pna_credit_re.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY' LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_users` `ou_credit_re` ON `ou_credit_re`.hyd_id = u_credit_re.user_id AND ou_credit_re.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od_credit_re` ON `od_credit_re`.`id` = `ou_credit_re`.`departmentid` AND `od_credit_re`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od2_credit_re` ON `od2_credit_re`.`id` = `od_credit_re`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_r_oa_department` `od3_credit_re` ON `od3_credit_re`.`id` = `od2_credit_re`.`parentid`
-- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_re_tender ON cast(ct.invite_user_attribute AS CHAR) = pna_re_tender.name_cd AND pna_re_tender.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY' -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_param_name pna_re_credit_tender ON cast(ct.invite_user_credit_attribute AS CHAR) = pna_re_credit_tender.name_cd AND pna_re_credit_tender.name_class = 'USER_PROPERTY'
LEFT JOIN ht_tender_agreement hta ON hta.tender_nid = ct.assign_nid
ORDER BY bc.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapitalPrice, SUM(ct.assign_price) AS sumAssignPrice, SUM(ct.assign_interest_advance) AS sumAssignInterestAdvance, SUM(ct.credit_fee) AS sumCreditFee, SUM(ct.assign_pay) AS sumAssignPay FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid

SELECT count(hct.assign_id) FROM ht_credit_tender hct
AND hct.credit_nid = #{creditNid}
